alert.note: Alert for Craighead; Crittenden; Mississippi; Poinsett (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Craighead, eastern Poinsett, western Mississippi and north central Crittenden Counties through 130 AM CDT... At 100 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bay, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jonesboro, Trumann, Manila, Marked Tree, Lake City, Leachville, Lepanto, Bay, Brookland, Monette, Caraway, Tyronza, Keiser, Dyess, Dell, Gilmore, Little River, Turrell, Etowah and Black Oak. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
